results.title: Impacts of Statin Therapy Strategies on Incidence of Ischemic Cerebrovascular Events in Patients With Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Systematic Review and Bayesian Network Meta-Analysis.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@Pravastatin@@@ (40 mg/d) decreased the incidence @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@ICEs@@@ compared with placebo (RR, 0.14; 95% CI, 0.03-0.65) and was ranked the most effective, presenting with a significantly lower rate of the incidence @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@ICEs@@@ than the worst-ranked @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (40 mg/d) (RR, 0.13; 95% CI, 0.02-0.79).

citations.NLM: Zhong S, Liu T, Zhai Q, Zhang X, Jing H, Li K, Liu S, Liu G, Wang L, Li L, Tao S, Ren L, Shi X, Bao Y. Impacts of Statin Therapy Strategies on Incidence of Ischemic Cerebrovascular Events in Patients With Aneurysmal Subarachnoid Hemorrhage: A Systematic Review and Bayesian Network Meta-Analysis. Neurosurgery. 2023 Feb 16;():. PMID: 36794961

results.title: Large-scale cohort study on the relationship between serum lipid concentrations and risk of cerebrovascular disease under low-dose simvastatin in Japanese patients with hypercholesterolemia: sub-analysis of the Japan Lipid Intervention Trial (J-LIT).
results.text_hl: METHODS AND RESULTS: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ were treated with 5-10 mg/day of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and all, including those who discontinued @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ for any reason, had their @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ concentrations and incidence of @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@CVD@@@ monitored for 6 years.

results.title: Simvastatin improves cerebrovascular function and counters soluble amyloid-beta, inflammation and oxidative stress in aged APP mice.
results.text_hl: Using 10 month-old @GENE_APP @GENE_11820 @@@amyloid precursor protein@@@ transgenic @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ (APP @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@), we sought to reverse @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@cerebrovascular, neuronal and memory impairments@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (20 mg/kg/day, 8 weeks).

results.title: Secondary prevention of major cerebrovascular events with seven different statins: a multi-treatment meta-analysis
results.text_hl: A study indirectly compared influence of @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on the @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@cerebrovascular events@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@CVEs@@@), but it was a placebo-control study with a small sample size and there were active comparator trials in this study.
